name.baseName: Polyester Staple Fiber ; Polyester chips ; Slicing - drying - melting- spinning - bundling - drawing - crimping - setting - cutting ; All sizes; NESPS2
涤纶短纤 ; 聚酯切片 ; 切片—干燥—熔融—纺丝—集束—牵伸—卷曲—定型—切断 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及从聚酯切片生产涤纶短纤维（PSF），涉及切片、干燥、熔融、纺丝、集束、牵伸、卷曲、定型和切割等多个阶段。PSF广泛应用于纺织行业，用于制造服装、家具和工业用途的织物。所提到的生产末端管理技术用于处理生产过程中产生的各种污染物，如磷、氨氮、化学需氧量、石油相关废物、有机氮和挥发性有机化合物等工业废水和排放气体中的污染物。这些技术对于确保环境合规和减少行业的生态足迹至关重要。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码28,三级代码282.0,四级代码2822文件，在完整版文件中第589页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为90。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution phosphorus, totalisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management82，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标总磷的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为82，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总磷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + physicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标石油类的末端治理技术是物理化学法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+物理化学法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为石油类，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Petroleum-related wasteisPhysicochemical treatment + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)

the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAdsorption + steam desorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management62
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸附+蒸气解析，其效率为62，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisDirect combustion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management62，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是直接燃烧，其效率为62，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisAbsorption + diversion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management32，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
